name: Pushka Adventures (TwoGentlemen)
description:
Dark times has come for our land...

A long time ago, humans create a thing called Pushka, no human known what Pushka for, until one day, the day when it happened. Pushka got out of control and starts destroying all around, no human known how stop the Pushka, until came him, who stopped the Pushka with his holy slap!

He tells scientists his secrets. And scientists build you, a robot, who can travel through time and space to stop the Pushka, but they send you much later than it supposed when planet already broken to pieces... 

So, that's how your story begins...
